title: BackToCali

content: As in the title, anyone has an idea what is profitable today to CPU mining etc?I have an aws code of $100k I am looking for an good idea to monetize it. I am looking for something unique

comments.author: JayDDee
comments.body: FYI, XMR is a coin, Monero to be specific. Anyone promoting a shitcoin requiring downloadingtheir "XMR" miner doesn't know what they're talking about and is probably a scammer. Don't download. XMR can be mined with any miner supporting RandomX algorithm. And so can any other coin using that algorithm.
